attributes.action: make tinted glass on ALL windows of cars and other vehicles legal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This would significantly reduce thefts from cars as the thieves would no longer be able to see the interior of the vehicle (stereo, navigation system etc)
The positive effect of the allowed tinted glass on the rear doors and rear windows is completely negated because the interior can still be seen through the windscreen and front doors.
There are a lot of people who want this. Think how many jobs it will create.
